code: import React from'react';import NVD3Chart from'react-nvd3';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function getDatum(){var sin=[],sin2=[],cos=[];for(var i=0;i<100;i++){sin.push({x:i,y:Math.sin(i/10)});sin2.push({x:i,y:Math.sin(i/10)*0.25+0.5});cos.push({x:i,y:0.5*Math.cos(i/10)});}return[{values:sin,key:'Sine Wave',color:'#A389D4'},{values:cos,key:'Cosine Wave',color:'#04a9f5'},{values:sin2,key:'Another sine wave',color:'#1de9b6',area:true}];}var LineChart=function LineChart(){var data=getDatum();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(NVD3Chart,{xAxis:{tickFormat:function tickFormat(d){return d;},axisLabel:'Time (ms)'},yAxis:{axisLabel:'Voltage (v)',tickFormat:function tickFormat(d){return parseFloat(d).toFixed(2);}},type:'lineChart',datum:data,x:'x',y:'y',height:300,renderEnd:function renderEnd(){console.log('renderEnd');}})});};export default LineChart;
